thread.section_title: Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Midtown East - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Best Stay Ever
thread.title_full: Best Stay Ever - Review of Residence Inn New York Manhattan/Midtown East, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Keyla H
title: Best Stay Ever
text: Our stay was absolutely fantastic! The entire staff was friendly and courteous from the front desk to housekeeping to the breakfast attendees. One employee stood out though. Herbert, a breakfast attendee, was phenomenal! We had a great conversation every morning. The food was always well stocked and the hotel wad very clean. The hotel was easy to get to and in walking distance of everything!
